MS MCQs

    Use OneDrive in Microsoft 365 - Summary and knowledge check

    »

    1. If you create a new file or upload a file into OneDrive, who will have access by default?

      Just you

      Members of your team

      All of your organization


    2. Which one of the following statements is true?

      Once you share a file in OneDrive, you cannot manage that sharing link.

      You need to go to OneDrive on the web to share files.

      You can view files both shared by you and shared with you in OneDrive.


    3. What is Files On-Demand?

      It lets you access your files in Microsoft Teams.

      It lets you restore previous versions of files.

      It lets you browse SharePoint and OneDrive files without downloading them.

      It lets you share OneDrive files from Office on the web.
